name: katex

scripts.build: yarn prestart && rimraf dist/ && mkdirp dist && cp README.md dist && rollup -c && webpack
scripts.dist: yarn test && yarn build && yarn dist:zip
scripts.dist:zip: rimraf katex/ katex.tar.gz katex.zip && cp -R dist katex && tar czf katex.tar.gz katex && zip -rq katex.zip katex && rimraf katex/
scripts.test: yarn prestart && yarn test:lint && yarn test:flow && yarn test:jest
scripts.test:lint:js: eslint *.js src static test contrib dockers website
